entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023
